<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ArrowsSkin" currentState="status_0" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        states="status_0,status_1,status_2,status_3,status_4" width="100" height="100">
	<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="100" height="100">
		<e:Image source="arrows_bg_png" />
		<e:Image source="arrows_png" visible.status_0="false" bottom.status_1="5" horizontalCenter.status_1="1"
		         rotation.status_2="-90" verticalCenter.status_2="0" right.status_2="5" rotation.status_3="180"
		         horizontalCenter.status_3="0" top.status_3="6" rotation.status_4="90" left.status_4="5"
		         verticalCenter.status_4="1" />
	</e:Group>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="text_time" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" font="fnt_arrows_fnt" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CardSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"
        states="c1_1,c1_2,c1_3,c2_1,c2_2,c2_3,c3_1,c3_2,c3_3,c4_1,c4_2,c4_3" width="76" height="110" height.c1_1="110">
        <e:Image id="img_bg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source.c1_1="card_face_2_png"
                 source.c1_2="card_face_1_png" source.c1_3="card_face_1_png" scaleX.c1_3="0.58" scaleY.c1_3="0.58"
                 source.c2_1="card_bg_1_png" source.c2_2="card_face_3_png" source.c2_3="card_face_3_png"
                 source.c3_1="card_bg_2_png" source.c3_2="card_face_1_png" scaleX.c3_2="0.58" scaleY.c3_2="0.58"
                 source.c3_3="card_face_1_png" scaleX.c3_3="0.58" scaleY.c3_3="0.58" source.c4_1="card_bg_1_png"
                 scaleX.c4_1="-1" source.c4_2="card_face_3_png" source.c4_3="card_face_3_png" verticalCenter.c1_1="0" />
        <e:Image id="img_serialNo" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter.c1_1="0"
                 verticalCenter.c1_1="12" horizontalCenter.c1_2="0" verticalCenter.c1_2="-14" scaleX.c1_3="0.58"
                 scaleY.c1_3="0.58" horizontalCenter.c1_3="0" verticalCenter.c1_3="-7.5" visible.c2_1="false"
                 rotation.c2_2="-90" scaleX.c2_2="0.58" scaleY.c2_2="0.58" horizontalCenter.c2_2="0.5"
                 verticalCenter.c2_2="-8" rotation.c2_3="-90" scaleX.c2_3="0.58" scaleY.c2_3="0.58"
                 horizontalCenter.c2_3="0.5" verticalCenter.c2_3="-8" visible.c3_1="false" rotation.c3_2="180"
                 scaleX.c3_2="0.58" scaleY.c3_2="0.58" horizontalCenter.c3_2="0" verticalCenter.c3_2="-8.5"
                 rotation.c3_3="180" scaleX.c3_3="0.58" scaleY.c3_3="0.58" horizontalCenter.c3_3="-0.5"
                 verticalCenter.c3_3="-8.5" visible.c4_1="false" scaleX.c4_2="0.58" scaleY.c4_2="0.58"
                 rotation.c4_2="90" horizontalCenter.c4_2="0.5" verticalCenter.c4_2="-8" scaleX.c4_3="0.58"
                 scaleY.c4_3="0.58" rotation.c4_3="90" horizontalCenter.c4_3="0.5" verticalCenter.c4_3="-8" />
        <e:Image id="img_wild" source="card_wild_png" includeIn="c1_1,c1_3" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"
                 horizontalCenter.c1_1="22" verticalCenter.c1_1="-18.5" visible="false" scaleX.c1_3="0.4"
                 scaleY.c1_3="0.4" horizontalCenter.c1_3="12.5" verticalCenter.c1_3="-23.5" scaleX.c1_1="0.7"
                 scaleY.c1_1="0.7" />
        <!--<e:Image id="mask_card" horizontalCenter="{img_bg.horizontalCenter}"
                     verticalCenter="{img_bg.verticalCenter}" includeIn="c1_1" source="card_face_2_png" visible="false" />
        -->
        <e:Image id="mask_card" horizontalCenter="{img_bg.horizontalCenter}" verticalCenter="{img_bg.verticalCenter}"
                 source.c1_1="card_face_2_png" source.c1_2="card_face_1_png" source.c1_3="card_face_1_png"
                 scaleX.c1_3="0.58" scaleY.c1_3="0.58" source.c2_1="card_bg_1_png" source.c2_2="card_face_3_png"
                 source.c2_3="card_face_3_png" source.c3_1="card_bg_2_png" source.c3_2="card_face_1_png"
                 scaleX.c3_2="0.58" scaleY.c3_2="0.58" source.c3_3="card_face_1_png" scaleX.c3_3="0.58"
                 scaleY.c3_3="0.58" source.c4_1="card_bg_1_png" scaleX.c4_1="-1" source.c4_2="card_face_3_png"
                 source.c4_3="card_face_3_png" verticalCenter.c1_1="0" visible="false" />
        <e:Rect id="rect_gary" mask="{mask_card}" width="100%" height="100%"
                horizontalCenter="{img_bg.horizontalCenter}" verticalCenter="{img_bg.verticalCenter}" includeIn="c1_1"
                fillAlpha="0.3" visible="false" />
        <e:Rect id="rect_light" mask="{mask_card}" width="100%" height="100%"
                horizontalCenter="{img_bg.horizontalCenter}" verticalCenter="{img_bg.verticalCenter}" visible="false"
                fillColor="0x000000" fillAlpha="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MenuSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"
        xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" width="1206" height="750">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="show">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{menu}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}" y="{75}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500" ease="circOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}" y="{95}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{rect_touch}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500" ease="circOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="hide">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{menu}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}" y="{95}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500" ease="circOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}" y="{75}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{rect_touch}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500" ease="circOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Rect id="rect_touch" fillAlpha="0.5" width="1206" height="750" />
	<e:Group id="menu" alpha="0" y="75" x="5">
		<e:Image source="menu_bg_png" />
		<e:Image source="menu_1_png" y="28.88" horizontalCenter="0" />
		<e:Image source="menu_2_png" y="127.04" horizontalCenter="0.5" />
		<e:Image source="menu_3_png" y="222.05" horizontalCenter="0.5" />
		<e:Image mask="m4mask" source="menu_4_png" y="314.55" horizontalCenter="0.5" />
		<e:Image id="m4mask" source="menu_4_png" y="314.55" horizontalCenter="0.5"  alpha="0.5"/>
		<e:Image mask="m5mask" source="menu_5_png" y="402.5" horizontalCenter="0.5" />
		<e:Image id="m5mask" source="menu_5_png" y="402.5" horizontalCenter="0.5"  alpha="0.5"/>
		<e:Rect id="rect_menu_1" height="83" y="19.69" width="317" fillAlpha="0" horizontalCenter="0" />
		<e:Rect id="rect_menu_2" height="83" y="112.86" width="317" fillAlpha="0" horizontalCenter="0" />
		<e:Rect id="rect_menu_3" height="83" y="206.2" width="317" fillAlpha="0" horizontalCenter="0" />
		<e:Rect id="rect_menu_4" height="83" y="298.2" width="317" fillAlpha="0" horizontalCenter="0" />
